1017.issue: [E1017] Licenses in [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/blob/master/package.json) and in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/blob/master/io-package.json) are different

1054.issue: [W1054] Missing suggested translation into uk of some "common.news" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/blob/master/io-package.json).

1057.issue: [E1057] js-controller 2.0.0 listed as dependency but 5.0.19 is required as minimum, 6.0.11 is recommended. Please update dependency at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/blob/master/io-package.json).

1076.issue: [E1076] Own adapter is not allowed to be listed at "common.restartAdapters" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/blob/master/io-package.json)

1081.issue: [W1081] "common.license" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/blob/master/io-package.json) is deprecated. Please define object "common.licenseInformation"

1082.issue: [E1082] Please remove "common.license" from [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/blob/master/io-package.json) as "common.licenseInformation" is declared.

1084.issue: [W1084] "common.title" is deprecated and replaced by "common.titleLang". Please remove from [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/blob/master/io-package.json).

1087.issue: [W1087] "common.materialize" replaced by property "common.adminUI.config" at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/blob/master/io-package.json). Please remove.

1090.issue: [E1090] admin dependency missing. admin 6.17.14 is required as minimum, 7.6.17 is recommended. Please add to globalDependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/blob/master/io-package.json).

1102.issue: [S1102] Consider adding 'vis-2' to "common.restartAdapters" as 'vis' is already listed in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/blob/master/io-package.json)

4036.issue: [S4036] Consider adding .vscode/settings.json file with JSON schema definitions for better development experience with Visual Studio Code.

5013.issue: [W5013] "gulpfile.js" found in repo! Think about migrating to @iobroker/adapter-dev package

5023.issue: [S5023] "package-lock.json" not found in repo! Please consider to commit it to github repository.

6006.issue: [E6006] Current adapter version 1.5.6 not found in [README.md](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/blob/master/README.md)

6009.issue: [W6009] Multiple copyright lines found in [README.md](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/blob/master/README.md) but line(s) 1 missing trailing spaces. Add two spaces at end of each copyright line (except last) for proper formatting.

7003.issue: [W7003] Multiple copyright lines found in LICENSE but line(s) 1 missing trailing spaces. Add two spaces at end of each copyright line (except last) for proper formatting.

8004.issue: [W8004] Please process issue [[#886] "Migration to ESLint 9 and @iobroker/eslint-config"](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/issues/886)

9006.issue: [S9006] .commitinfo file should be excluded by .gitignore, please add a line with text ".commitinfo" to .gitignore

0029.issue: [E0029] Node.js 18 is required as minimum, node.js 20 is recommended. Please change "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '16' } }" to "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '18' } }" at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/blob/master/package.json).

0033.issue: [E0033] @iobroker/adapter-core 3.1.6 specified. 3.2.3 is required as minimum, 3.3.2 (or newer) is current. Please update dependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/blob/master/package.json)

0036.issue: [E0036] @iobroker/legacy-testing 1.0.12 specified. 2.0.2 is required as minimum,  2.0.2 (or newer) is current. Please update devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/blob/master/package.json)

0057.issue: [W0057] Wildcard devDependencies should be avoided "iobroker.web":"*". Use "~1.2.3" or "^1.2.3" syntax at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.vis/blob/master/package.json).
